titleStmt.title: A declaration exhibited to the French king, by hys Court of Parlyament concerning the holy League Whereunto is adioyned: an aduertisement to the three estates of Fraunce, comprehending a true report of such occurrences as haue passed betweene the house of Guize, in fauour of the holy League: and the king of Nauarre & his adherents for their necessarie defence. Faithfully translated out of French.
titleStmt.author: France. Parlement (Paris)

titleStmt.title: A declaration exhibited to the French king, by hys Court of Parlyament concerning the holy League Whereunto is adioyned: an aduertisement to the three estates of Fraunce, comprehending a true report of such occurrences as haue passed betweene the house of Guize, in fauour of the holy League: and the king of Nauarre & his adherents for their necessarie defence. Faithfully translated out of French.
titleStmt.author: France. Parlement (Paris)
Aggas, Edward, attributed name.
Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by Abell Ieffes, for Thomas Cadman],

notesStmt.note: Printer's and bookseller's names from colophon.
Includes "An aduertisement to the three estates of Fraunce, concerning the warre of the League", sometimes attributed to Philippe de Mornay.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly,
